loop-spacetime.title: Loop SpaceTime-Quantum Series
loop-spacetime.intro: The Loop SpaceTime â€“ Quantum Series project is conceived as a progressive journey: from a toroidal space that folds back onto itself, through relational networks without hierarchy, to Quantum Graphity, where the reference to Loop Quantum Gravity becomes explicit.
loop-spacetime.intro2: In Loop Quantum Gravity, spacetime is discrete and relational, often represented as a network of nodes, and gravity emerges from the relations between them.
loop-spacetime.collections.title: Collections
loop-spacetime.collections.intro: Each collection brings together a series of works that explore the same structure, varying parameters, relationships, and formal possibilities.
loop-spacetime.collection.quantumgraphit: A research into emergent structures where space is not given, but arises from relationships between elements.
loop-spacetime.collection.toridallattice: A space that folds back onto itself, abolishing the boundary between inside and outside and questioning the idea of origin.
There is no exterior and no origin: every direction returns, as if the universe recognized only its own rhythm.
loop-spacetime.collection.spinnetwork.te: The Spin Network with fixed variance represents a space that is not yet space: an essential network in which every node has the same number of connections. Before the universe takes shape, everything exists in a condition of perfect equanimity.
It is a structure without hierarchies, where nothing prevails and everything exists only through relation.
Studies of discrete geometries inspired by Loop Quantum Gravity models, where continuity emerges from finite relations.
loop-spacetime.collection.graphity.title: Quantum graphity
loop-spacetime.collection.graphity.text-: I work with relational systems inspired by Loop Quantum Gravity.
Forms emerge from networks and probabilistic models, as temporary outcomes of relations that organize and dissolve over time.
I do not design a geometry; I let it reveal itself.
loop-spacetime.collection.comingsoon.tex: A new research project is currently under development.
